product.name: Young Professional One
product.shortDescription: Exclusively for under 30's with a 4-year qualification, this bundle includes ONE account that pays you interest and ONE facility with up to 40-days interest free credit, plus all the private banking perks at a 50% reduced monthly fee.

features.name: No-funds alert
features.description: Get notified by SMS when you don't have enough funds to pay your debit orders.
